name: Mirror Shielding Techniques
description: Deflecting and neutralizing negative energies, psychic attacks, and manipulative intent.

cards.title: Constructing a Reflective Energy Field
cards.description: Training in the visualization and projection of mirrored energy shields.
bulletpoints: Visualize a mirror-like energy field that reflects incoming psychic force.
Align the shield’s frequency to deflect targeted energy rather than absorbing it.
Use reinforcement techniques to prevent external breaches and maintain stability.
cards.summaryText: Visualize the mirrored shell, tune its frequency to deflect, and reinforce it until it never cracks.

cards.title: Rebounding Psychic Attacks
cards.description: Using reflection techniques to send negative energy back to its source.
bulletpoints: Detect the direction of the energy attack before initiating a counter-reflection.
Project an energetic mirror to return the force to its origin without absorbing it.
Adjust shield intensity based on the attacker’s energy strength to maximize deflection.
cards.summaryText: Track where the hit is coming from, raise the mirror, and send the force back untouched.

cards.title: Camouflaging Your Energetic Signature
cards.description: Blending your energy to become undetectable to those attempting to psychically track or influence you.
bulletpoints: Modify your aura’s frequency to blend into environmental energy fields.
Use energy diffusion techniques to scatter your vibrational signature across multiple points.
Deploy a frequency cloak that prevents psychic detection or remote viewing.
cards.summaryText: Blend your aura into the surroundings, diffuse your signature, and cloak frequency to evade trackers.

cards.title: Invisibility Shielding
cards.description: Creating an energy veil that makes you imperceptible to hostile forces.
bulletpoints: Engage in vibrational modulation to drop below perception thresholds.
Use frequency blending to match surrounding energy, rendering yourself undetectable.
Integrate shifting techniques to remain dynamically invisible in energetic combat.
cards.summaryText: Modulate vibration, match the environment, and keep shifting so hostile senses slide past you.

cards.title: Energetic Deflection Bubbles
cards.description: Creating an automatic repulsion field that bounces negative forces away before they reach you.
bulletpoints: Establish a resilient energy barrier that pushes back foreign influences.
Program the shield to repel specific energy signatures, preventing future infiltration.
Enhance the reflective layer with elemental forces such as fire or plasma-based energy fields.
cards.summaryText: Form a repulsion bubble, program it against specific signatures, and fuel it with elemental force.

cards.title: Quantum Mirror Defense
cards.description: Using multi-dimensional shielding techniques to redirect attacks into different energetic planes.
bulletpoints: Split incoming force into fragmented dimensions, dispersing its effectiveness.
Encode shields with non-linear feedback loops to scramble tracking attempts.
Use temporal displacement techniques to delay attacks before neutralizing them.
cards.summaryText: Fracture the attack across dimensions, scramble the feedback, and delay it out of usefulness.

cards.title: Refractive Energy Cloaking
cards.description: Using layered shielding to manipulate energy waves and bend perception.
bulletpoints: Develop a prismatic field that refracts external energy away from your core essence.
Create multi-tiered defensive layers that redirect incoming forces before they impact.
Use light-bending visualization methods to distort hostile perception fields.
cards.summaryText: Stack prismatic layers that bend and redirect hostile waves before they ever reach you.

cards.title: Psychic Decoy Projection
cards.description: Creating an illusionary energy signature to mislead attackers and manipulators.
bulletpoints: Generate a false energy imprint to draw attention away from your actual presence.
Use oscillating energy pulses to shift between multiple signature points.
Deploy phantom constructs that mimic your energy field and lead enemies astray.
cards.summaryText: Spin up decoy signatures and phantom constructs so attackers chase ghosts instead of you.

cards.title: Absorption and Redirection Loop
cards.description: Transforming hostile energy into a neutral or beneficial state before sending it back.
bulletpoints: Convert incoming attacks into kinetic energy and cycle it back as neutral force.
Use harmonic resonance to shift malicious energy into constructive frequency states.
Redirect absorbed energy into external etheric systems for passive shielding boosts.
cards.summaryText: Absorb the hit, transmute it through resonance, and send it back as neutral or helpful force.

cards.title: The Ripple Effect Technique
cards.description: Creating an energetic shockwave that disperses negative energy outward in waves.
bulletpoints: Generate a cascading ripple of high-frequency energy to dissolve external interference.
Use wave pattern amplification to extend shield coverage across wider areas.
Employ controlled oscillations to destabilize persistent energy attacks.
cards.summaryText: Launch high-frequency ripples that dissolve interference and push waves of protection outward.
